name: Kosey´s Revenge
description:
This game is based on the book of the same author of the game, called "Koseys Revenge".

Kosey is a noble man from ancient Egypt, that must punish a corrupted leader.

I tried to do the game alone, and that was my first Ludum Dare. I love it!

I hope I can improve next time, and do better games. Just to see a part of my story in a game format, all done in 48 hours is incredible.
